scene

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene.SceneElement
      • scene.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends SceneElement
    The canvas object represents a peice of paper in the SuperSpirograph setup. This paper can be drawn on with Pens.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Canvas(float length, float width, java.awt.Color background)
      Constructs a canvas.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the canvas, returning all color values to Canvas.Backgroundcolor
      void draw(Wheel rotationPiece, GearedObject ImmobilePiece, Pen pen, GeometryPoint penHole, float initialRotation)
      Draws a spiral on the canvas.
      void export(java.lang.String fileName, Format format)
      Exports the current SuperSpirograph to an image file

      • Methods inherited from class scene.SceneElement

        addChildElement, getGlobalCoordinate, rotate, scale, scale, setParent, translate

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Canvas

        public Canvas(float length,
              float width,
              java.awt.Color background)
        Constructs a canvas. Note that the canvas acts as the root scene element.
        Parameters:
        background - the default color of this canvas. All pixels start this color.
        length - the length of the canvas. Units are the same as for Geometry.
        width - the width of the canvas. Units are the same as for Geometry.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(Wheel rotationPiece,
                 GearedObject ImmobilePiece,
                 Pen pen,
                 GeometryPoint penHole,
                 float initialRotation)
        Draws a spiral on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        rotationPiece - the peice which will be rotated to create a spiral.
        ImmobilePiece - the peice which will be placed on the canvas to define the spiral. Note, the Immobile peice must be a child scene element to the canvas.
        initialRotation - the initial rotation in radians of the rotationPeice. Use this to do phase offsets.
        pen - the pen properties to use in the spiral
        penHole - the location on the rotation peice where the pen should be placed.

      • export

        public void export(java.lang.String fileName,
                   Format format)
        Exports the current SuperSpirograph to an image file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the path to export the spirograph
        format - the file format to export the spirograph

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the canvas, returning all color values to Canvas.Backgroundcolor
